title: Cyber Threat Awareness Integration in Governance
objective: To establish a regular reporting mechanism on emerging cyber threats during board governance meetings, enhancing strategic oversight and resource allocation for cybersecurity initiatives.
timeline_phases: Phase 1: Initial Assessment and Requirement Gathering
kpis: Number of briefings conducted per quarter
Feedback from board members on the relevance of updates
Reduction in response time to emerging threats
Increased resource allocation towards cybersecurity initiatives
risks: Resistance to change among board members
Inconsistent reporting from IT Security Team
Rapidly changing threat landscape that may outpace scheduled updates
